docs.snippet: Crystal Palace manager Tony Pulis said he was relieved to have secured their Premier league status before facing nightmare fixtures against title-chasing Manchester City and Liverpool....
docs.lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace manager Tony Pulis said he was relieved to have secured their Premier league status before facing nightmare fixtures against title-chasing Manchester City and Liverpool.

headline.main: Pulis Relief as Palace Secure Safety Before Title-Chasers Arrive
headline.print_headline: Pulis Relief as Palace Secure Safety Before Title-Chasers Arrive

docs.snippet: Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure, one of six nominees for the Professional Footballers' Association (PFA) player of the year award, says he would have more global recognition if he was not from Africa....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure, one of six nominees for the Professional Footballers' Association (PFA) player of the year award, says he would have more global recognition if he was not from Africa.

headline.main: I'd Have More Recognition if I Wasn't African, Says Toure
headline.print_headline: I'd Have More Recognition if I Wasn't African, Says Toure

docs.snippet: Paris St Germain collected their first trophy of the season when Edinson Cavani's double secured a 2-1 victory against Olympique Lyon in the French League Cup final on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paris St Germain collected their first trophy of the season when Edinson Cavani's double secured a 2-1 victory against Olympique Lyon in the French League Cup final on Saturday.

headline.main: Cavani Double Hands PSG French League Cup Trophy
headline.print_headline: Cavani Double Hands PSG French League Cup Trophy

docs.snippet: A.S.F. Fratia Bucharest, a soccer team in the Romanian fifth division, is the only club in its league run on the principles of equality and nondiscrimination....
docs.lead_paragraph: A.S.F. Fratia Bucharest, a soccer team in the Romanian fifth division, is the only club in its league run on the principles of equality and nondiscrimination.
docs.abstract: ASF Fratia Bucuresti, a soccer team in the Romanian fifth division, is the only club in its league run on the principles of equality and nondiscrimination; team's goalie, Tudorel Mihailescu, has succeeded despite left arm that does not extend beyond elbow.

headline.main: Built on Brotherhood, Club Lives Up to Name
headline.print_headline: Built on Brotherhood, Club Lives Up to Name

byline.contributor: Emanuel Rosu and Alina Totti contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: A comment by the head of scientific activities for the International Olympic Committee threw a spotlight on the tension between spectacle and safety in the Winter Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: A comment by the head of scientific activities for the International Olympic Committee threw a spotlight on the tension between spectacle and safety in the Winter Games.
docs.abstract: Christopher Clarey On The Olympics column examines tension that occurred between spectacle and safety at the 2014 Olympic Winter Games; notes that Dr Lars Engebretsen of the International Olympic Committee has raised concerns about high rate of injury during inaugural slopestyle event.

headline.main: Slopestyle Asks, When Is a Risky Sport Too Dangerous?
headline.print_headline: Balancing Spectacle and Safety on Snow

docs.snippet: Juventus moved closer to a third consecutive Serie A title when a long-range Paul Pogba goal beat a dogged Bologna side 1-0, while AS Roma secured second spot and a Champions League place by winning 1-0 at Fiorentina....
docs.lead_paragraph: Juventus moved closer to a third consecutive Serie A title when a long-range Paul Pogba goal beat a dogged Bologna side 1-0, while AS Roma secured second spot and a Champions League place by winning 1-0 at Fiorentina.

headline.main: Juventus Edge Towards Title With Bologna Victory
headline.print_headline: Juventus Edge Towards Title With Bologna Victory
